description: This file defines the declaration of the StateTransitionHandler class within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. It contains the class's constructor, destructor, singleton accessor method, initialization and termination functions, and a method to add state transition requests. The class manages state transitions related to the application's lifecycle.

classes.name: StateTransitionHandler
classes.description: A singleton class responsible for handling state transition requests within the application, providing methods for initialization, termination, and request management.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Returns the singleton instance of the StateTransitionHandler.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the state transition handler, preparing it to process requests.

methods.name: terminate
methods.description: Terminates the state transition handler, performing any necessary cleanup.

methods.name: addRequest
methods.description: Adds a new StateTransitionRequest to the handler for processing.
